title: can't block certain playernames
body:
Having some bad games and trying to block some players but strangely, cannot due to their names having weird system symbols or the accents and whatnot.

I'd like to see a feature where we DO NOT need to type out a playername to BLOCK them.

I don't give a shit about reports...easy to do those as needed.
but if I want to block a player with a  strange name...you cannot highlight/copy on their profile to get the name to paste in BLOCK PLAYER section.

is this on purpose? Is this a feature that's going to be a permanent thing?

I just want a way to block people easier than relying on typing out their names, espescially when they have goofyass system charachters and such which make it nearly impossible to remove/avoid in the future.
